policies.name: Active businesses are viewable by everyone
Admins can view all businesses
policies.usingClause:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'admin'::user_role))))

policies.name: Admins can view all profiles
policies.usingClause:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles profiles_1
  WHERE ((profiles_1.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles_1.role = 'admin'::user_role))))

details.reason: Requires Vercel dashboard + secret rotation approvals.
Live Stripe payment and webhook replay need human supervision.
Vercel/Stripe toggles enforced during final go/no-go.
Must be exercised with real card + observers.
Needs invoice PDF inspection + accounting approval.
Requires legal + comms leads to sign launch docs.
Needs Vercel production env inspect via MCP/browser.
Needs DNS provider screenshots/API (MCP) for production domain.
